isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 9: LUBRICATING OIL PUMP, OIL FILTER AND COOLER - PRIME THE LUBRICATING SYSTEM - Crankcase Refill Capacities:

svcproc.title: Crankcase Refill Capacities:

note.para: Engines equipped with a by-pass filtering system require additional oil.

BE SURE THE ENGINE IS WELL OILED DURING ASSEMBLY IN ORDER TO USE THIS PROCEDURE. IF THE ENGINE IS NOT WELL OILED DO NOT USE THIS PROCEDURE, REFER TO "PRIME THE LUBRICATING SYSTEM (PREFERRED METHOD)" IN THIS SECTION FOR FURTHER INFORMATION.

svcproc.para: Use the following instructions prior to starting the engine. This is done to prevent any damage to internal parts.

step1.para: Using the cranking motor, spin but DO NOT start the engine, until oil pressure is read on the oil pressure gauge.
When oil pressure is read, the engine may be started.
